12.title: Golden Legacy.

notes: Each issue has also a distinctive title.
Imprint varies: eleven of the Library's issues are unauthorized reprints by Baylor Publishing Co. and Community Enterprizes, Inc., of Seattle, Wash.
Educational comic of African American history and biography.
